name: Whomst Fortress Defense
description:
This is a game where you collect reasources in order to build a fort and defend the core from bomb themed enemies!

Player controls:
  • WASD - Move
  • Left Shift - Dash
  • LMB - Destroy Trees
  • RMB - Shoot Bomb
Building controls:
  • WASD - Move Camera
  • Q/E - Rotate Camera
  • LMB - Place Building
  • RMB - Rotate Building
  • X/DEL - Delete Building
  • Pressing the building's number cycles between types

Enter - Continue
